reuters.title: CENTRONICS CORP <CEN> YEAR LOSS
reuters.body: Oper shr loss 11 cts vs loss 36 cts Oper net loss 2,383,000 vs loss 4,285,000 Total income 2,194,000 vs nil NOTE: Resultes restated for discontinued operations and exclude discontinued operations loss 5,755,000 dlrs vs gain 4,933,000 dlrs. Reuter 
